contactsurveys: Download Contact Surveys for use in Infectious Disease Modelling

Source: R/contactsurveys-package.R
contactsurveys-package.Rd

Provides methods for downloading contact surveys that are then used in infectious disease modelling.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/epiforecasts/contactsurveys

  • http://epiforecasts.io/contactsurveys/

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/epiforecasts/contactsurveys/issues
